channel.title: Pre Ordered Halo Reach
channel.description:
I just pre-ordered Halo Reach and I get it on September 8th. I like Halo 3 a lot so I decided to get Halo Reach.
I have no clue what the game play is even like. I heard there is some beta testing leaks somewhere, but I have yet to find any leaked information.
Discuss Halo Reach.

item.title: Pre Ordered Halo Reach
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

[quote=“glestrts, post:4, topic:324025”][quote author=ziplock link=topic=420428.msg3088346#msg3088346 date=1262671137]They said Halo Reach was suppose to be the successor of all the other Halo series releases.
[/quote]
Lies!
Halo 1 was the shit, 2 was the worst out of the 3, and 3 was slightly worse than 1 but still cool.[/quote]
Rofl, 2 was the BEST of the series. 1) Campaign was the LONGEST 2) Full of glitches (www.youtube.com/user/xlax007) 3) Good maps

Read full topic

item.title: Pre Ordered Halo Reach
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

TOMSCAPE BETA:

To be honest, i wasn’t that impressed with Halo ODST, I’m not even going to think of buying Halo reach before i see the gameplay. But Halo 3 (And the ones before) were really great.

That’s the only reason I pre-ordered it is because of Halo 3 and it’s previous releases. I haven’t even played Halo ODST so I wouldn’t know. They said Halo Reach was suppose to be the successor of all the other Halo series releases, but people can say anything.

Read full topic
